content:
{"name": "The Grocery Spot", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Shoppers who are not registered can arrive at The Grocery Spot 10 minutes before their appointment to complete the registration process.
One time registration required.
You MUST sign up for an appointment to shop. Go to https://thegroceryspot.org/ and click the pop-up that says "SHOPPERS CLICK HERE" to go directly to https://thegroceryspot.org/information-for-shoppers/

Tuesday appointments are for the general public.

Friday appointments are for individuals who are actively employed, college students, or veterans and MUST show valid work/school/military ID or paperwork.", "email": "", "url": "https://thegroceryspot.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2615 Donald Lee Hollowell Parkway Northwest", "address_2": null, "city": "Center Hill", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30318", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.776047, "longitude": -84.47194789999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(470) 252-6351", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration on website required"}]}
